name: I, Bounty Hunter
description:
Three cosmic troublemakers are on the run and you are hired to track them down and bring them back, dead or alive.

Your search takes you to the far edges of the known universe, to a planet called Hades, a place covered in danger and mystery.

CHAPTER 1  - The Murder

You have reached  Hades, but a murder has put the Outpost under lockdown. The suspect, Mr. 101 has hired you to investigate the murder and clear his name.

Explore and investigate to find out who the real killer is.
